It wouldn't be here, would it?
Is the key processing done here?

string.name: 游戏帮助#n玩家扮演一名宠物训练师，为了解决国家的危机而踏上了冒险之旅。#n操作提示#n点击主线任务图标：主线任务#n点击支线任务图标：支线任务#n点击地图图标：游戏地图#n点击屏幕控制上下左右移动#n本版本只支持横屏游戏

resources.string: Game Help#nYou play as a pet trainer embarking on an adventure to solve the crisis of the country.#nOperation tips#nClick on the main quest icon: Main quest#nClick on the side quest icon: Side quest#nClick on the map icon: Game map#nClick on the screen to control the up, down, left and right movement#nThis version only supports landscape mode

string.name: 宠物王国5-彩虹#n开发商：华娱无线#n客服电话：#n010-88901665#n客服Email:#ngeekan@imy.cn

resources.string: Pet Kingdom 5 - Rainbow#nDeveloper: Huayu Wireless#nCustomer Service Phone:#n010-88901665#nCustomer Service Email:#ngeekan@imy.cn
An enemy has appeared, let's fight!

string.name: 考验的时刻来了，训练师！

resources.string: The moment of test has come, trainer!
Capture pets to your heart's content!

string.name: 忠诚度降低，攻击力下降，请及时补充！

resources.string: Loyalty decreased, attack power decreased, please replenish in time!

string.name: 宠物忠诚度为0，请立刻补充！

resources.string: Pet loyalty is 0, please replenish immediately!

string.name: 忠诚度过低，宠物不服从主人命令

resources.string: Loyalty is too low, the pet disobeys the owner's commands

string.name: 石化效果无法行动，受到的伤害减少30%

resources.string: Petrified effect, cannot move, damage taken reduced by 30%
Drowsy effect, hit rate decreased by 50%

string.name: 撕裂效果，减少当前血量的10%

resources.string: Tear effect, reduces current health by 10%

string.name: 魅惑效果，不能逃跑，增加捕获宠物的几率

resources.string: Charm effect, cannot run away, increases the chance of capturing pets

string.name: 禁锢效果，不能逃跑，不能换怪，不能使用道具

resources.string: Imprison effect, cannot run away, cannot change monsters, cannot use items

string.name: 腐蚀效果，每回合受到一定伤害

resources.string: Corrosion effect, receive certain damage each round

string.name: 封闭效果，不能使用4级以上技能

resources.string: Seal effect, cannot use level 4 or higher skills

string.name: 封闭效果，对幽暗鬼王不起作用

resources.string: Seal effect, does not work on the Dark Ghost King

string.name: 在限定时间里接尽量多的球到框里，最后根据框里球的分数来换取金钱。

resources.string: Catch as many balls as possible in the basket within the limited time, and finally exchange the score of the balls in the basket for money.
Maybe you will succeed next time.

string.name: 选择你认为会得第一的一只宠物和押注的大小，注数越大获胜后的奖励越丰厚！

resources.string: Choose the pet you think will come first and the size of the bet. The bigger the bet, the richer the reward after winning!

string.name: 一注：#n投入100金，#n获胜得120金。#n二注：#n投入300金，#n获胜得350金。#n三注：#n投入1000金，#n获胜得1200金。

resources.string: One bet:#nInvest 100 gold,#nGet 120 gold for winning.#nTwo bets:#nInvest 300 gold,#nGet 350 gold for winning.#nThree bets:#nInvest 1000 gold,#nGet 1200 gold for winning.
Please select the pet to bet on:

string.name: 每喂一个兴奋菇花费10金，可增加一格兴奋度。

resources.string: Each feeding of an excitement mushroom costs 10 gold and increases excitement by one level.
One bet 100 gold#nTwo bets 300 gold#nThree bets 1000 gold

string.name: 您当前的训练师等级已达到上限！

resources.string: Your current trainer level has reached the limit!

string.name: #0，您商店能存放的宠物#7暴增到

resources.string: #0, the number of pets your shop can store has increased to #7
#0 You still need to capture #7 to level up next

string.name: #0只不同的宠物，努力获得新宠吧。

resources.string: #0 different pets, work hard to get new pets.

string.name: 此次您没有捕获到全新的宠物，捕获并不是唯一途径，有些宠物需要通过进化才能获得哦。

resources.string: This time you didn't capture a new pet. Capture is not the only way. Some pets need to be obtained through evolution.

string.name: 个新宠物，这里是王国训练师机构奖励给您的

resources.string: new pets. Here are the rewards from the Kingdom Trainer Organization for you

string.name: 个徽章，希望再接再厉哦。

resources.string: badges, I hope you will keep up the good work.

string.name: 恭喜您的训练师等级已提升为#7

resources.string: Congratulations, your trainer level has been upgraded to #7

string.name: #0，您随身可携带宠物数量#7暴增到

resources.string: #0, the number of pets you can carry has increased to #7

string.name: #4主线任务#0已更新，点击#7工具包内的主线按钮#0可查看任务表。

resources.string: #4 Main quest #0 has been updated, click the main button in the #7 toolbox #0 to view the task list.

string.name: #4分支任务#0已更新，点击#7工具包内的支线按钮#0可查看任务表。

resources.string: #4 Side quest #0 has been updated, click the side button in the #7 toolbox #0 to view the task list.
Not enough space in the backpack.

string.name: 游戏暂停，点击屏幕返回。

resources.string: Game paused, tap the screen to return.

string.name: 购买8000金#n购买80000金#n购买10徽章#n购买50徽章#n宠物升级#n购买神龟#n正版验证#n战斗复活#n短信商城

resources.string: Buy 8000 gold#nBuy 80000 gold#nBuy 10 badges#nBuy 50 badges#nPet upgrade#nBuy divine turtle#nGenuine verification#nBattle revival#nSMS store
Do not need to use this item

string.name: 宠物空间已满，无法获得新的宠物，请整理寄存所空出一个空间。

resources.string: Pet space is full, cannot obtain new pets. Please clear up some space in the deposit.
Experience is full, can be hatched.

string.name: 奇异兽不仅跑得快而且可以不遇敌，现提供试骑体验，正版验证后需购买！

resources.string: The strange beast is not only fast, but also can avoid encountering enemies. A trial ride is now available, and you need to buy it after genuine verification!

string.name: 携带的宠物全都牺牲了!

resources.string: All the carried pets have sacrificed!

string.name: 您的宠物已经无法获得经验

resources.string: Your pet can no longer gain experience

string.name: 身上必须携带一只能参战的宠物！

resources.string: You must have a pet that can participate in battle!

string.name: 恭喜您把所有的宠物都收集齐了

resources.string: Congratulations, you have collected all the pets

string.name: 之前未保存的部分将会丢失，是否继续？

resources.string: The previously unsaved parts will be lost, continue?

string.name: 沉睡之歌效果，怪物强制换场！

resources.string: Lullaby effect, the monster is forced to switch!

string.name: 所能携带的宠物已经达到上限！

resources.string: The number of pets that can be carried has reached the limit!

string.name: 放生的宠物将会消失，是否继续？

resources.string: The released pets will disappear, continue?
The pet you are carrying has been restored.
Glared at you and ran away!

string.name: 战斗失败了,训练师的梦想不能实现了!

resources.string: The battle failed, the trainer's dream cannot be realized!
Do you want to continue the game, are you sure?

string.name: 等级没有达到15级，不能进化！

resources.string: Level has not reached level 15, cannot evolve!

string.name: 等级没有达到25级，不能进化！

resources.string: Level has not reached level 25, cannot evolve!

string.name: 等级没有达到30级，不能进化！

resources.string: Level has not reached level 30, cannot evolve!

string.name: 这将清除您之前的所有记录，是否继续？

resources.string: This will clear all your previous records, continue?

string.name: 金属克野兽，野兽克植物，植物克飞行，飞行克海洋，海洋克金属

resources.string: Metal beats beast, beast beats plant, plant beats flying, flying beats ocean, ocean beats metal

string.name: 钥匙，钥匙在商店中可以购买。

resources.string: Key, keys can be purchased in the shop.

string.name: 宝箱，宝箱在战斗后一定几率获得。

resources.string: Treasure chest, treasure chests have a certain chance of being obtained after battle.
(Turning off sound will make the game run smoother)

string.name: 下坐骑#n植物坐骑#n金属坐骑#n飞行坐骑#n野兽坐骑#n海洋坐骑#n无此坐骑

resources.string: Dismount#nPlant mount#nMetal mount#nFlying mount#nBeast mount#nOcean mount#nNo such mount
Have not obtained this mount pet
Can only be used in water

string.name: 孵化所已经没有空位了

resources.string: No space left in the hatchery

string.name: 复活死亡的宠物并为其回复生命值的

resources.string: Revive the dead pet and restore its HP

string.name: 复活死亡的宠物并为其回复生命值的30%,请勿在宠物战斗中购买!

resources.string: Revive the dead pet and restore 30% of its HP, please do not buy during pet battles!
Already have the avoid monster effect
Please select the skill to replace!

string.name: #7点击屏幕或用导航键#0控制上下左右移动。

resources.string: #7 Tap the screen or use the navigation keys #0 to control up, down, left and right movement.

string.name: #7点击屏幕#0控制上下左右移动。

resources.string: #7 Tap the screen #0 to control up, down, left and right movement.
Your pets do not need restoring!

string.name: 身为四大家族之首的贵公子，没钱可不行！立刻拥有5000金。

resources.string: As the noble son of the head of the four major families, you can't be without money! Get 5000 gold immediately.

string.name: 购买该特殊道具，立刻拥有10徽章，能购买双倍经验，宠物技能，强大的宠物捕获球等各种神奇的道具。

resources.string: Buy this special item and immediately have 10 badges, which can be used to purchase double experience, pet skills, powerful pet capture balls, and other magical items.

string.name: 让您随身携带的全部宠物立刻升5级（超过70级宠物不能再升级）

resources.string: Let all the pets you carry level up by 5 immediately (pets over level 70 cannot level up anymore)

string.name: 购买该特殊道具，获得可爱的奇异兽，移动速度可以提高一倍，且不会遇到任何敌人！无限使用，心动不如行动，快购买吧！

resources.string: Buy this special item to obtain a cute strange beast, which can double your movement speed and you won't encounter any enemies! Unlimited use, take action now, buy it now!

string.name: 游戏试玩结束，购买此项将开启后续所有游戏内容、地图。同时将免费赠送您5枚徽章（可购买强力道具）

resources.string: The game trial is over, buy this item to unlock all subsequent game content and maps. You will also be given 5 badges for free (which can be used to buy powerful items)

string.name: 让您携带的所有宠物全恢复，同时立刻让您携带的宠物提升5级（超过70级宠物不能再升级），让接下来的战斗变的更轻松。

resources.string: Restore all the pets you carry, and at the same time immediately upgrade the pets you carry by 5 levels (pets over level 70 cannot level up anymore), making the next battle easier.

string.name: 目前没有可以升级的宠物！

resources.string: No pets that can be upgraded at the moment!

string.name: 购买已成功！游戏已保存。#n新游戏后此功能不再要求付费。

resources.string: Purchase successful! Game saved. #nThis function will no longer require payment after a new game.

string.name: 购买已成功！获得5枚徽章(背包的卷轴界面可查看）。游戏已保存。#n新游戏后此功能不再要求付费。

resources.string: Purchase successful! Obtain 5 badges (can be viewed in the scroll interface of the backpack). Game saved. #nThis function will no longer require payment after a new game.

string.name: 条短信。购买此项，还需发送

resources.string: SMS messages. To purchase this item, you still need to send

string.name: 条短信。确认发送短信吗？

resources.string: SMS messages. Confirm to send SMS?

string.name: 在卷轴商店中才能看到徽章数量

resources.string: The number of badges can only be seen in the scroll shop

string.name: 携带的宠物全部升5级,宠物页面查看新属性

resources.string: All carried pets level up by 5, view the new attributes on the pet page

string.name: 购买后此功能不再要求付费

resources.string: This function no longer requires payment after purchase
